marklogic.body:
the same old blame game. author Acts like the leaders in the nations he mentioned were little babies having their chains yanked by the big bad 'westerners'. a plot around every corner.* what does he think these nations were doing before the rise of the western powers?Â until arabs stop fixiating on blaming the west, Jews, Israel, and and the 'zionist conspiracy' they will remain political toddlers
* and the CONSTANT carping on the tired 'ol '53 Iranian coup. If I have to hear about that anymore i think I'll Vomit.
